79a554e3a0954a4e865b2b7dfda4d:
  'Name': Sign Documents
  'Intent-Description': The user needs to sign any necessary documents related to
    their departure.
  'Attribute':
    6e9e82f5e54648eeb24aeaa182229:
      'Name': document_type
      'Description': The type of document that needs to be signed.
    9b52800307e645689c12006f46e89:
      'Name': signature_method
      'Description': The method by which the user will sign the documents.
23557c9de0a747499734d8339e2b9:
  'Name': Discuss Final Pay
  'Intent-Description': The user has questions about their final paycheck or benefits
    payout.
  'Attribute':
    d918cc7454bf4f91b51346e608ced:
      'Name': pay_type
      'Description': The type of payment or benefit the user wants to discuss.
      'Slot-Required-values':
      - final_paycheck
      - vacation_payout
      - severance_pay
      - stock_options
    36de7e7b322b474d82f31168c38ea:
      'Name': pay_amount
      'Description': The expected amount of the payment or benefit.
    fc105efd6cd7414ca5a00f9d03245:
      'Name': pay_date
      'Description': The expected date of the payment or benefit.
7aa9febe1b2446c4af68b03c36d0b:
  'Name': Change Contact Info
  'Intent-Description': The user needs to update their contact information for future
    communication.
  'Attribute':
    798dd28c1fc04f7e938b9d9743c8b:
      'Name': contact_type
      'Description': The type of contact information to be updated.
    869252bcec684589b5dee97069ea1:
      'Name': new_info
      'Description': The new contact information that will replace the old
        one.
6e335bc42f514834b66c943895370:
  'Name': Review Benefits
  'Intent-Description': The user wants to understand the benefits they are entitled
    to after leaving the company.
  'Attribute':
    2151817cd24646c49a82eca7fc605:
      'Name': benefit_type
      'Description': The type of benefit the user wants to review.
f27f37a82a814e288924270d4cd88:
  'Name': Submit Feedback
  'Intent-Description': The user wishes to provide feedback about their employment
    experience.
  'Attribute':
    1dfbded38e4b4b039ba5d8dd7758f:
      'Name': feedback_category
      'Description': The category of the feedback being submitted.
      'Slot-Required-values':
      - work_environment
      - management
      - colleagues
      - salary_benefits
      - career_growth
    76801bbb4f8e4a9da1223ca92cc12:
      'Name': feedback_type
      'Description': The type of feedback being submitted.
f360ad650b1d497da1d2e6d408288:
  'Name': Ask References
  'Intent-Description': The user wants to know the company's policy on providing
    references.
  'Attribute':
    8036e5baf2344d7b91c6c202afb56:
      'Name': reference_type
      'Description': The type of reference the user wants to ask for.
    862b3d44349b4287ae31d860152fb:
      'Name': reference_person
      'Description': The specific person or department the user wants to ask
        for a reference from.
      'Slot-Required-values':
      - manager
      - HR
      - colleague
    88535451c57444e3a35e80872904b:
      'Name': reference_reason
      'Description': The reason the user needs the reference.
      'Slot-Required-values':
      - job application
      - rental application
      - school application
b48f0a11306a45bab44c072c4e069:
  'Name': none of the above
  'Intent-Description': Matches none of the other intents
